body_content.explanation: a thing, for example a computer, that has a higher level of intelligence than humans:
examples: Is there a risk that an uncontrolled machine superintelligence will be able to build better and better machines?
If there were a super-intelligence taking over the world, this is probably how they would do it.

body_content.explanation: the intelligence that such a thing has:
examples: He believes that computers will become so powerful that a new type of superintelligence will develop.
They were interested in the search for extraterrestrial superintelligence.
